name: Black Plague - Pirate Warships
description:
Feel like a real pirate captain controlling the large authentic ship under your own black flag and conquering the sea! Charge your mighty cannons and be ready to attack every ship on your way – there might be some treasures, of course! Join this stunning Black Plague - Pirate Warships game and swim through the ocean in search of scrambles and interesting things!

Black Plague - Pirate Warships features:
• Authentic battleship pirate game
• Large beautiful pirate ship to control
• Many interesting enemies standing in your way
• Lots of fighting and gathering missions
• Collectible boosters – invulnerability and double damage
• The wide range of pirate ships to play for
• Interesting system of power-ups
• Amazing ocean surroundings made in 3D

Become the best sea captain ever – choose the pirate’s side of Black Plague - Pirate Warships and have fun!
